page.title: 19FARMER'S DAUGHTERS REPORT 1.
page.content: Every morning at 7am my Dad gets up to feed the animals. Then he goes to his building work. My Mum feeds her ducks, hens, geese and a goat. My Dad is a self employed builder with a small holding of about 25 acres. My grandad also has the same amount of land. He has 100 sheep and about 40 head of cattle. We also have Rip, the sheepdog and Sam, the cat. When we are hay making we get about 1275 bales, some of them silage. One year we put Rape on stony field for the sheep. The field beside that is called Twin Trees. Most of the year we use our fields for grazing. The top field is used by the Spring Vale Rovers football club. We have two Damson trees, four Apple trees and three plum trees by the house and lawns.
